con:method.name: inboundCommunication
con:method.con:description: Receives inbout communication from external source given the rest url above. MEVEO handles it by throwing an inbount communication event with the communicationRequestDto.

con:method.name: customerHierarchyUpdate
con:method.con:description: What this service does: This service allows to create / update (if exist already) and close / terminate (if termination date is set) a list of customer, customer accounts, billing accounts, user accounts, subscriptions, services, and access in one transaction. It can activate and terminate subscription and service instance. Close customer account. Terminate billing and user account.

con:method.name: findAccountHierarchy2
con:method.con:description: CUST = 1, CA = 2, BA = 4, UA = 8. Is an update of findAccountHierarchy wherein the user can search on 1 or multiple levels of the hierarchy in 1 search. These are the modes that can be combined by using bitwise - or |. Example: If we search on level=BA for lastName=legaspi and found a match, the search will return the hierarchy from BA to CUST. If we search on level=UA for address1=my_address and found a match, the search will return the hierarchy from UA to CUST.

con:method.name: cancelBillingRun
con:method.con:description: Sets RatedTransaction.status associated to billingRun to OPEN. Remove aggregates and invoice associated to the billingRun. Set billingAccount.billingRun to null. Cancels a billing run

con:method.name: createBillingRun
con:method.con:description: Creates billing run

con:method.name: getBillingAccountListInRun
con:method.con:description: Returns the list of billable billing accounts of a billing run

con:method.name: getBillingRunInfo
con:method.con:description: Creates billing run

con:method.name: getPostInvoicingReport
con:method.con:description: Returns the PostInvoicingReport entity

con:method.name: getPreInvoicingReport
con:method.con:description: Returns the PreInvoicingReport entity

con:method.name: user
con:method.con:description: Returns the authenticated user

con:method.name: validateBillingRun
con:method.con:description: Validates a billing run. Sets the next invoice date of a billing account to the next calendar date.

con:method.con:description: Returns the current MEVEO API version

con:method.name: cancelReservation
con:method.con:description: Cancels the reservation

con:method.name: chargeCdr
con:method.con:description: Same as registerCDR, but at the same process rate the edr created

con:method.name: confirmReservation
con:method.con:description: Confirms the reservation

con:method.name: registerCdrList
con:method.con:description: CDR is same format use in mediation job Accepts a list of CDR line. This CDR is parsed and created as EDR.

con:method.name: reserveCdr
con:method.con:description: A reservation has expiration limit save in the provider entity (PREPAID_RESRV_DELAY_MS) Allows the user to reserve a cdr, this will create a new reservation entity attached to a wallet operation

con:method.name: user
con:method.con:description: Returns the authenticated user

con:method.con:description: Returns the current MEVEO API version

con:method.name: create
con:method.con:description: This function allows to create a subscription. It does not activate it.

con:method.name: update
con:method.con:description: This function updates a subscription. It cannot update a subscription with status=RESILIATED.

con:method.name: activateServices
con:method.con:description: Activate services. Subscription should not be in status (RESILIATED OR CANCELLED). This service allows to override the charge instance price before activation. This service is actually a 2 step process: service instantiation then activation. If service.subscriptionDate is not set a service is only instantiated else it's instantiated then activated.

con:method.name: applyOneShotChargeInstance
con:method.con:description: Apply one shot charge. Subscription should not be in status (RESILIATED OR CANCELLED).

con:method.name: listByUserAccount
con:method.con:description: Return a list of subscriptions given a user account.

con:method.name: terminateSubscription
con:method.con:description: Terminate a subscription. If subscription status is RESILIATED, an error is thrown.

con:method.name: terminateServices
con:method.con:description: Terminate a list of services. If a service is already TERMINATED, an error is thrown.

con:testStep.name: Record Updated DateTime on Database of Related Entities

con:testStep.con:description: Check again the updated dateTime of the related entities.

con:config.con:expectedResult: They should still be the same since we used the same json request on all the createOrUpdate requests.

con:restRequest.name: createOrUpdateCRMAccountHierarchy
con:restRequest.con:request: { "code": "${#TestSuite#ticket}_CRM-CUST", "description": "${#TestSuite#ticket}_CRM-CUST", "crmAccountType": "C_UA", "crmParentCode": "MAIN_SELLER", "paymentMethod": "DIRECTDEBIT", "language": "FRA", "country": "FR", "billingCycle": "CYC_INV_MT_1", "currency": "USD", "name": { "title": "M", "firstName": "Abdelhadi", "lastName": "NASSEH" }, "address": { "address1": "17 lot figuig as", "address2": "17 lot figuig as", "address3": "", "zipCode": "20250", "city": "Casablanca", "country": "FR" }, "contactInformation": { "email": "anasseh@yahoo.fr", "phone": "+212629951689" }, "seller": "Customer to User Account", "customerCategory": "PROSPECT", "customerBrand": "DEFAULT" }

con:testSuite.name: #1724 - [WS] REST PUT /provider resets invoiceConfiguration and bankCoordinates

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "code" : "1724_provider", "description" : "1724_1", "multiCurrency" : true, "multiCountry" : true, "multiLanguage" : true, "userAccount" : "...", "invoiceSequenceSize" : 12345, "enterprise" : true, "levelDuplication" : true, "invoicePrefix" : "...", "currentInvoiceNb" : 12345, "displayFreeTransacInInvoice" : true, "invoiceAdjustmentPrefix" : "...", "currentInvoiceAdjustmentNb" : 12345, "invoiceAdjustmentSequenceSize" : 12345, "rounding" : 12345, "prepaidReservationExpirationDelayinMillisec" : 12345, "discountAccountingCode" : "...", "email" : "email@manaty.net", "bankCoordinates" : { "bankCode" : "123", "branchCode" : "22", "accountNumber" : "3" }, "invoiceConfiguration" : { "displaySubscriptions" : false, "displayServices" : true, "displayOffers" : false, "displayEdrs" : true, "displayProvider" : true, "displayCfAsXML" : true, "displayPricePlans" : false, "displayDetail" : true, "displayChargesPeriods" : true } }

con:restRequest.name: update
con:restRequest.con:request: { "code" : "1724_provider", "description" : "1724_provider_updated", "multiCurrency" : true, "multiCountry" : true, "multiLanguage" : true, "invoiceSequenceSize" : 12345, "enterprise" : true, "levelDuplication" : true, "currentInvoiceNb" : 12345, "displayFreeTransacInInvoice" : true, "invoiceAdjustmentPrefix" : "...", "currentInvoiceAdjustmentNb" : 12345, "invoiceAdjustmentSequenceSize" : 12345, "rounding" : 12345, "prepaidReservationExpirationDelayinMillisec" : 12345, "discountAccountingCode" : "...", "email" : "emailupdate@open.com" }
